Package com.shouldis.bitset.function

Interface MatrixFunction

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.function.Function<Matrix,​Matrix>
public interface MatrixFunction
extends java.util.function.Function<Matrix,​Matrix>
Functional interface used to apply functions to a Matrix.
Author:
Aaron Shouldis

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static MatrixFunction CONCURRENT_COPY
    MatrixFunction that returns a copy of the specified Matrix backed by a ConcurrentBitSet using Matrix.createConcurrent(Matrix).
    static MatrixFunction COPY
    MatrixFunction that returns a copy of the specified Matrix backed by a BitSet using Matrix.create(Matrix).
    static MatrixFunction FLIP
    MatrixFunction that flips the x-coordinate and y-coordinate of all bits in the specified Matrix, effectively rotating it 180 degrees.
    static MatrixFunction FLIP_X
    MatrixFunction that flips the x-coordinate of all bits in the specified Matrix, mirroring it along the y-axis.
    static MatrixFunction FLIP_Y
    MatrixFunction that flips the y-coordinate of all bits in the specified Matrix, mirroring it along the x-axis.
    static MatrixFunction IMMUTABLE_COPY
    MatrixFunction that returns a copy of the specified Matrix backed by an ImmutableBitSet using Matrix.createImmutable(Matrix).
    static MatrixFunction INLINE_COPY
    MatrixFunction that returns a copy of the specified Matrix backed by an InlineBitSet using Matrix.createInline(Matrix).
    static MatrixFunction ROTATE_L
    MatrixFunction that rotates the specified Matrix 90 degrees to the left (counter-clockwise).
    static MatrixFunction ROTATE_R
    MatrixFunction that rotates the specified Matrix 90 degrees to the right (clockwise).
    static MatrixFunction TRANSPOSE
    MatrixFunction that performs a transpose operation on the specified Matrix.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Matrix apply​(Matrix matrix)
    Function used to perform operations on a Matrix.
    static MatrixFunction bitRotateL​(int distance)
    MatrixFunction derived from WordFunction.rotateL(int) used to rotate the bits within a specified Matrix to the left.
    static MatrixFunction bitRotateR​(int distance)
    MatrixFunction derived from WordFunction.rotateR(int) used to rotate the bits within a specified Matrix to the right.
    static MatrixFunction bitShiftL​(int distance)
    MatrixFunction derived from WordFunction.shiftL(int) used to shift the bits within a specified Matrix to the left.
    static MatrixFunction bitShiftR​(int distance)
    MatrixFunction derived from WordFunction.shiftR(int) used to shift the bits within a specified Matrix to the right.
    static MatrixFunction combine​(MatrixFunction first, MatrixFunction second)
    Creates a MatrixFunction which performs the two specified MatrixFunctions first and second in sequence.
    static MatrixFunction of​(WordFunction function)
    Creates a MatrixFunction which performs the specified WordFunction function on each word contained in the matrix provided.

    Methods inherited from interface java.util.function.Function

    andThen, compose

  • Method Details

    • apply

      Matrix apply​(Matrix matrix)
      Function used to perform operations on a Matrix.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface java.util.function.Function<Matrix,​Matrix>
      Parameters:
      matrix - the BitSet to manipulate.
      Returns:
      the manipulated matrix.

    • bitShiftR

      static MatrixFunction bitShiftR​(int distance)
      MatrixFunction derived from WordFunction.shiftR(int) used to shift the bits within a specified Matrix to the right.
      Parameters:
      distance - how far to shift the bits to the right.
      Returns:
      a function representing a shift by distance bits.

    • bitShiftL

      static MatrixFunction bitShiftL​(int distance)
      MatrixFunction derived from WordFunction.shiftL(int) used to shift the bits within a specified Matrix to the left.
      Parameters:
      distance - how far to shift the bits to the left.
      Returns:
      a function representing a shift by distance bits.

    • bitRotateR

      static MatrixFunction bitRotateR​(int distance)
      MatrixFunction derived from WordFunction.rotateR(int) used to rotate the bits within a specified Matrix to the right.
      Parameters:
      distance - how far to rotate the bits to the right.
      Returns:
      a function representing a rotation by distance bits.

    • bitRotateL

      static MatrixFunction bitRotateL​(int distance)
      MatrixFunction derived from WordFunction.rotateL(int) used to rotate the bits within a specified Matrix to the left.
      Parameters:
      distance - how far to rotate the bits to the left.
      Returns:
      a function representing a rotation by distance bits.

    • of

      static MatrixFunction of​(WordFunction function)
      Creates a MatrixFunction which performs the specified WordFunction function on each word contained in the matrix provided.
      Parameters:
      function - the WordFunction to be applied to the matrix.
      Returns:
      a MatrixFunction which applied the specified function.

    • combine

      static MatrixFunction combine​(MatrixFunction first, MatrixFunction second)
      Creates a MatrixFunction which performs the two specified MatrixFunctions first and second in sequence.
      Parameters:
      first - the first MatrixFunction to be applied to the word argument.
      second - the second MatrixFunction to be applied to the result of first.
      Returns:
      a MatrixFunction which applies both first and second.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if first or second are null.
